details: Acts very destructively on the kidneys, producing a croupous nephritis, hemoglobinuria, etc. Parenchymatous nephritis with stomatitis. Produces most acute ulcerative and follicular stomatitis.  Noma. Toxemic conditions of pregnancy (urinary symptoms). Chronic Nephritis; hepatitis. Septicemia.

Stomach: Feeling of weight in epigastric and umbilical region
Stool: Necleo-albumin and bile, high phosphoric acid, with toatl solids
Mouth: Whole mucous surface red, tumid, with gray based ulcers

name: Kali chloricum
